actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Force Strike

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dart

specialTraits.description: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.
specialTraits.name: Unarmored Defense
